title: turkmoney
author: turkmoney
content: Hello dear bitcointalk members We have been conducting authorized ecurrency exchange transactions since 2012. All of our transactions are carried out with API systems given to authorized merchants. We are also registered as a merchant on the webmoney megastock list. https://megastock.com/Resource.aspx?id=318036 our exchange services Webmoney WMZ to Bank Transfer TRYWebmoney WMZ to PaypalWebmoney WMZ to Binance USD BUSDWebmoney WMZ to TETHER USD USDTWebmoney WMZ to Perfectmoney USDWebmoney WMZ to Payeer USDWebmoney WMZ to Credit Card TRYWebmoney WMZ to Advcash USDWebmoney WMZ to E-Payment (Fups,Ozan,PeP,Oldubil,Uption,Param) Perfectmoney USD to Webmoney WMZPerfectmoney USD to Binance USD BUSDPerfectmoney USD to TETHER USD USDTPerfectmoney USD to Payeer USDPerfectmoney USD to Advcash USDPerfectmoney USD to E-Payment (Fups,Ozan,PeP,Oldubil,Uption,Param) Payeer USD to Webmoney WMZPayeer USD to Binance USD BUSDPayeer USD to TETHER USD USDTPayeer USD to PerfectmoneyPayeer USD to Advcash USDPayeer USD to E-Payment (Fups,Ozan,PeP,Oldubil,Uption,Param) Binance USD  BUSD to Perfectmoney USDBinance USD  BUSD to Webmoney WMZBinance USD  BUSD to Payeer USDBinance USD  BUSD to Advcash USDBinance USD  BUSD to E-Payment (Fups,Ozan,PeP,Oldubil,Uption,Param) Tether USD USDT to Webmoney WMZTether USD USDT to Perfectmoney USDTether USD USDT to Payeer USDTether USD USDT to Advcash USDTether USD USDT to E-Payment (Fups,Ozan,PeP,Oldubil,Uption,Param) Paymer Check USD to Perfectmoney USDPaymer Check USD to Payeer USDPaymer Check USD to Advcash USDPaymer Check USD to E-Payment (Fups,Ozan,PeP,Oldubil,Uption,Param) We are at your service with many other transactions Contact Telegram: https://telegram.me/turkmoney Whatsapp: https://wa.me/message/TJTD4TUFUW2SD1 Skype: https://join.skype.com/invite/FcOveioafich E-Mail: admin@turkmoney.net

comments.author: turkmoney
comments.body: We pay all Türkiye cards. We pay for Papara, Oldubil, Ozan, PeP card, Fups card, ininal card and all other cards.We, as TurkMoney, are the only official Turkey trader in the webmoney megastock catalog.https://megastock.com/Resource.aspx?id=318036Best Regards

comments.author: turkmoney
comments.body: Hello dear users.Payment options with USDC, TUSD and Papara have been added to our exchange transactions. We load money into Ozan, Oldubil, Fups and other applications. With these applications, you can shop at more affordable prices from PlayStation, Xbox, Spotify and many similar systems.Best Regards.Turkmoney Exchange Services

comments.author: turkmoney
comments.body: First Digital USD FDUSD and Pax Dollar USDP have been added to our transactions.

comments.author: SecuredNet
comments.body: Good Lucky with you Servnice is low buggi this is a english forum and not a turkey forum ^^can you Sepa or Paysafecard adden? or Wise

comments.author: turkmoney
comments.body: Quote from: SecuredNet on September 14, 2023, 06:59:16 PMGood Lucky with you Servnice is low buggi this is a english forum and not a turkey forum ^^can you Sepa or Paysafecard adden? or WiseWise does not allow exchange services, but we can offer services for SEPA and PayPal in the future. Also, I know there is an English forum   thank you for your warning.
